Articles.Content: just a fun idea. make a REALLY small flyer. then put a lot of them on a big plane by having the octoganol struts or something like that and then a small seperator because flyers that small have problems with aerodynamics with the radial decouplers and then set all the flyers to point toward (you can use a mod  to set the autopilot on all the flyers at once if you want, it makes it a lot easier and A LOT less tedious) a plane of your choosing and then try to avoid them.

just a flat octo core with a battery, small inline reaction wheel and a oscar-b fuel tank. with a small air intake in front and a juno engine in back. with the basic fins you get from the start on the campain in any config that works for you.

Edited February 22, 2017 by rockets-don't-make-toast
You should post pictures of an attempt so we know you've invested some time and you're serious about the challenge.  We also need some clear goals so we know if we've been successful or not.
i meant it as something fun to do if your board. not really a challenge as much as... just a fun idea.
Well... this is challenge and mission ideas, so....
